DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine glycemic index 4 pulse-based bread least 10 normal healthy human volunteer . Participants study morning 6 separate day overnight fast . On first last day consume test meal consist 2 slice white bread ( 50g carbohydrate ) 4 day consume 2-3 slice ( 50g carbohydrate ) 4 different test bread contain starch obtain pulse ( bean and/or lentil ) . Blood glucose measure interval 2 hour . Glycemic index calculate 0.71 time F/WB F incremental area curve blood glucose ( AUC ) test bread WB mean AUC white bread .
DOC.brief_title: Measuring Glycemic Index Pulse Based Breads
DOC.criteria: participant good health know history HIV know history diabetes history hepatitis within last 3 month heart condition require hospitalization within 3 month use medication presence condition opinion study physician , would increase risk harm subject others , affect result study . participant comply experimental procedure safety guideline Glycemic Index Laboratories , Inc .
